title: Junior UI/UX Developer
description: This job requires knowledge in CSS, HTML, Tailwind and Ruby on Rails

title: Assistant Camera crew
description: This job requires knowledge in CSS, HTML, Tailwind and Ruby on Rails

title: Assistant Stylist
description: This job requires knowledge in CSS, HTML, Tailwind and Ruby on Rails

title: Assistant Graphic Designer
description: The Job requires experience in Photoshop and illustrator. Will be working directly with the creative director adding details to industrial design projects for a major furniture store. Tasks will be given based on performance of the first two weeks as well as portfolio experience. Please add portfolio link in personal message section.

title: Archicad junior designer
description: The job requires basic knowledge on Archicad for designing basic floor plans and ideally 3d structures. Will be working alongside a senior architect. Will be given tasks depending on completion of these. Will shadow and repeat steps already done in the project for proof of knowledge

title: Startup Accounting Intern
description: The tasks to be completed during the job period are the following but not limited to: bookeeping, cleaning previouse accounting period spreadshits, data analysis, tax records analysis, balance sheets reviews, etc. Requires exceptional attention to detail. This is a full time job.

title: Photography Assistant
description: Needed for a 4 week project including around 6 photoshoots. Requires knowledge in professional photography, lighting, and product photography as well as model photography. Will be interacting with professional photographers and tagging along with them during the shoots as well as the editing of the content. This is a part time job on-site.
